categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Gareth Lorca was a human male Jedi with facial scars and a cybernetic eye. He dual-wielded two orange lightsabers.

Gareth Lorca was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio in 2011. Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay and was subsequently published by GamesRadar in 2014. Lorca was created as one of several Jedi adversaries Maul's descendant would encounter throughout the game. Two other Jedi concepts were also created, Nexus Wan and Bix Creo.
